declaration.statement: The Inflation Reduction Act will cut the deficit by $300 billion over the next decade.
declaration.statement_context: White House statement upon signing of the Inflation Reduction Act, August 16, 2022.
declaration.source_excerpt: The Inflation Reduction Act will cut the deficit by about $300 billion over the next decade.

expected_outcome.description: Cumulative deficit reduction attributable to IRA provisions reaches $300 billion by 2032

success_conditions: CBO reports >= $270B attributable deficit reduction (10% margin)

operationalization.operationalization_notes: Using CBO scoring methodology. Deficit reduction must be attributable to IRA provisions specifically, not general economic factors.
